## Developer Guide

If you are new to using `nbdev` here are some useful pointers to get you
started.

### Install iomeval in Development mode

``` sh
# make sure iomeval package is installed in development mode
$ pip install -e .

# make changes under nbs/ directory
# ...

# compile to have changes apply to iomeval
$ nbdev_prepare
```

## Usage

### Installation

Install latest from the GitHub
[repository](https://github.com/franckalbinet/iomeval):

``` sh
$ pip install git+https://github.com/franckalbinet/iomeval.git
```

or from [conda](https://anaconda.org/franckalbinet/iomeval)

``` sh
$ conda install -c franckalbinet iomeval
```

or from [pypi](https://pypi.org/project/iomeval/)

``` sh
$ pip install iomeval
```

### Documentation

Documentation can be found hosted on this GitHub
[repository](https://github.com/franckalbinet/iomeval)’s
[pages](https://franckalbinet.github.io/iomeval/). Additionally you can
find package manager specific guidelines on
[conda](https://anaconda.org/franckalbinet/iomeval) and
[pypi](https://pypi.org/project/iomeval/) respectively.
